title: edexcel logo typeface
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052612im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Edexcel%20Logo_CMYK%20Light_4559.jpg)

Anyone got any ideas? From what I can tell this is just one typeface but let me know if not! Ideally I need to know both.  
Thanks for any help.

Font: 

 Bliss 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052612/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: undividual

comments.content: Jeremy Tankard's [Bliss](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052612/http:/typography.net/fontfamilies/view/28) but you'll need to customized it to recreate 'edexcel' lettering (squooshing, reducing /d ascender and reworking /c terminals to fit /e outline shape)
Great, thanks! Looks like a nice typeface. Fortunately I don't need to recreate the entire logo, just add an additional phrase, so that should be simple enough.
